text: Danny Murphy (22 February 1884 – 1 November 1956) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). ==Fitzroy (VFL)== He made his debut, as one of the seven new players for Fitzroy — i.e., Ernie Everett, Jack Furness, Cliff Hutton, Frank Lamont, Tom Moloughney, Danny Murphy, and Eric WatsonLeague Matches, The Australasian, (Saturday, 6 May 1911), p.23. — against Melbourne on 29 April 1911. == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1884 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players
title: Danny Murphy (Australian footballer, born 1884)
